comments:
When opening the "New" wizard and selecting "JPA Project" I get a NullPointerException. After confirming it by clicking "OK" focus is back on the "New" wizard page. When selecting "JPA Project" again the wizard changes to the view where the JPA settings are entered,  but it is empty.
